about_the_game:
The Guns of Icarus Alliance soundtrack is a massive compilation of all of the music across Guns of Icarus Alliance and Guns of Icarus Online. It features 44 tracks, 2.5 hours of music, and the works of 4 talented indie composers - Andrés Soto, Jonathan Gong, Zain Effendi, and Adam Chimera. Included in this soundtrack are all of the main themes, all the new Faction themes, as well as the live recordings of the string quartet arrangements - (Adventure Orchestra and Adventure Orchestra Pizzicato). For the live arrangements, we’ve also included their sheet music!

Once you purchase the Soundtrack, you can find it by right clicking on Guns of Icarus Alliance in your Steam Library. Then, click on Properties and select the Local Files tab. If you then Browse Local Files, you'll see the soundtrack folder with all the tracks in there. Enjoy!


Guns of Icarus Alliance

Time: 1 hour 40 min

01 Alliance Main Theme - Andrés Soto
02 Homeland Invasion - Jonathan Gong
03 Betrayer of Souls - Jonathan Gong
04 Mercantile Guild Theme - Andrés Soto
05 Captain's Maneuver - Jonathan Gong
06 Scavengers - Jonathan Gong
07 Anglean Republic Theme - Andrés Soto
08 Grand Skyway of the Armada - Jonathan Gong
09 Fjord Baronies Theme - Andrés Soto
10 Damage Control - Jonathan Gong
11 New Beginnings - Jonathan Gong
12 Order of Chaladon - Theme Andrés Soto
13 Arming Time - Jonathan Gong
14 Galleon Dance - Jonathan Gong
15 Yeshan Empire - Andrés Soto
16 Navigating the Minefield - Jonathan Gong
17 The World Beneath the Ice - Jonathan Gong
18 Traversing the Blue Veil - Jonathan Gong
19 Arashi League Theme - Andrés Soto
20 End of All things - Jonathan Gong
21The New Manifest Destiny - Jonathan Gong
22 Boss Theme - Andrés Soto
23 The World - Jonathan Gong
24 Quest for Imperium - Andrés Soto


Guns of Icarus Online

Time: 49 min

25. Adventure - Zain Effendi
26. Battle - Zain Effendi
27. Another Day in Hostile Skies - Adam Chimera
28. Stealth - Zain Effendi
29.The Icarus - Gimmen Gong
30. Victory - Gimmen Gong
31. Defeat - Gimmen Gong
32. Crimson Sky - Gimmen Gong
33. Gabriel's Legacy - Gimmen Gong
34. Town (in-game Remix) - Adam Chimera
35. Another Day in Hostile Skies (Adventure Remix) - Adam Chimera
36. Another Day in Hostile Skies (Battle Remix) - Adam Chimera
37. Adventure Orchestra - Andrés Soto
38. Adventure Orchestra Pizzicato - Andrés Soto
39. Classic Title - Adam Chimera
40. Classic Intro - Adam Chimera
41. Classic Theme - Adam Chimera
42. Classic Theme (Alternate Mix) - Adam Chimera
43. Classic Defeat - Adam Chimera
44. Classic Victory - Adam Chimera
